attributes.action: Allow all Gurkha's who have served in HM forces to become domiciled in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is deplorable that loyal servants of the Crown should be treated in such a shabby manner. 

The PM's decision not to allow all Gurkha's, who have loyally served in HM forces, to become domiciled in the UK is his decision alone and is not shared by the majority of voters in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
